title: Question 69

Ipilimumab has a response rate as a single agent of 10% to 15%. Nivolumab and other anti–PD-1 antibodies, such as pembrolizumab, have a response rate of about 40%. The combination is more active than either drug alone, although it is associated with more immune toxicities. This immunotherapy combination is effective whether the melanoma is
mutated or not. Some of these responses are quite durable with a minority of patients remaining free of recurrence for many years.
